privacy.title: PRIVATE
privacy.subtitle: STUFF!
privacy.intro: WE CARE ABOUT YOUR DATA AS MUCH AS WE CARE ABOUT CLEAN CODE! HERE'S HOW WE KEEP THINGS SAFE AND HAPPY!
privacy.section1_text: WE ONLY COLLECT WHAT'S NECESSARY TO MAKE YOUR EXPERIENCE AWESOME! LIKE YOUR PREFERRED LANGUAGE AND THEME.
privacy.section2_text: WE USE YOUR DATA TO KEEP THE SITE RUNNING SMOOTHLY AND TO REMEMBER YOUR COOL PREFERENCES!
privacy.section3_text: WE USE LITTLE COOKIES TO REMEMBER IF YOU LIKE DARK MODE OR ARABIC. THEY'RE NOT THE EATABLE KIND, BUT THEY'RE HELPFUL!

terms.title: THE
terms.subtitle: RULES!
terms.intro: WELCOME TO COOL TIPS! BY HANGING OUT HERE, YOU AGREE TO BE AWESOME AND FOLLOW THESE SIMPLE GUIDELINES!
terms.section1_text: TREAT EVERYONE WITH RESPECT! WE'RE ALL HERE TO LEARN AND MAKE COOL STUFF TOGETHER.
terms.section2_text: THE CODE AND TIPS WE SHARE ARE FOR LEARNING. FEEL FREE TO USE THEM IN YOUR PROJECTS AND MAKE MAGIC HAPPEN!
terms.section3_text: PLEASE DON'T TRY TO BREAK THE SITE OR DO ANYTHING MEAN. KEEP THE VIBES POSITIVE!
